column2: # Filter the data for each complete years 2018 to 2023 and make sure to use only durg induced cases
filter(`Month` >= ym("2018-01") & `Month` <= ym("2023-12") & `UCD - Drug/Alcohol Induced` == "Drug-induced causes")
